title: Ancient meditation practices find new life in modern religious communities across America
description: On most Monday nights, the sanctuary of All Saints Episcopal Church — with its vaulted ceilings, stone arches and stained-glass windows — seamlessly transforms into a space of quiet contemplation.

title: MSMEs Can Cut 100% Fossil Fuel Use for Industrial Heat With Biomass, Says MNRE–GIZ Study
description: The report states India’s MSMEs could cut costs and emissions by replacing fossil fuels with biomass-based green steam, leveraging surplus agro-residues and strong policy support.

title: Arcade Archaeology is digging up pinball inside Aviation Mall
description: A multigenerational group of pinball enthusiasts gathered in Aviation Museum for a New Year’s Eve tournament.

title: Families can watch ancient 'wassail' ceremony to bless trees in East Yorkshire orchard
description: Carr House Farm at Foston on the Wolds is opening its gates in the coming weeks

title: Gould Asset Management LLC CA Acquires 9,487 Shares of SPDR S&P Fossil Fuel Reserves Free ETF $SPYX
description: Gould Asset Management LLC CA grew its holdings in shares of SPDR S&P Fossil Fuel Reserves Free ETF (NYSEARCA:SPYX – Free Report) by 5.5% in the 3rd quarter, according to its most recent disclosure with the SEC. The fund owned 183,066 shares of the company’s stock after acquiring an additional 9,487 shares during the period. [...]
